args.question: How many vacation days do I get per year?

sub_questions: What is the total number of vacation days provided annually?
How is vacation time accrued each year?
Are vacation days based on tenure or position?
Does the company offer paid or unpaid vacation days?
Are there any differences in vacation days for full-time versus part-time employees?

args.question: How many vacation days do I get per year?
sub_questions: What is the total number of vacation days provided annually?
How is vacation time accrued each year?
Are vacation days based on tenure or position?
Does the company offer paid or unpaid vacation days?
Are there any differences in vacation days for full-time versus part-time employees?

retrieved_docs.page_content: Employees at ACME Corp accrue vacation days annually. Full-time employees receive 20 days per year, accrued bi-weekly. Time off must be requested at least two weeks in advance via the employee portal. Unused vacation days up to a maximum of 5 days, can be rolled over to the next calendar year. Rollover days expire on March 31st. Manager approval is required and is final.
ACME Corp processes payroll on a bi-weekly basis. Pay stubs are available on the 15th and last day of each month via the employee portal. Direct deposit is mandatory.

ACME Corp reimburses employees for pre-approved, business-related expenses. This includes travel, accommodation,

and client meals. For client meals, the reimbursement limit is $50 per person. All expense reports must be

submitted through the Concur portal within 30 days of the expense being incurred. Original receipts are mandatory

for all claims over $25.

ACME Corp conducts annual performance reviews every November. The process includes a self-assessment by the

employee, followed by a formal review meeting with their direct manager. Goals for the upcoming year are set duri

this meeting. Mid-year check-ins are held in May to discuss progress, but these are informal.
Employees are expected to maintain the highest ethical standards. Harassment and discrimination are not tolerated. All communication should be professional.
All new employees at ACME Corp receive a new MacBook Pro on their first day. Please see IT to comple setup. All software must be approved by IT.

**For booking travel for a client visit:**
- Ensure your travel expenses are pre-approved and business-related.
- You can be reimbursed for travel, accommodation, and client meals (with a $50 per person limit for client meals).
- After incurring expenses, submit your expense report through the Concur portal within 30 days.
- Original receipts are mandatory for all claims over $25.

**For taking a day off afterwards:**
- Request your vacation day at least two weeks in advance via the employee portal.
- Manager approval is required and is final. 
- Vacation days accrue at 20 days per year for full-time employees, accrued bi-weekly. Unused vacation days (up to 5 days) can be rolled over to the next calendar year, expiring March 31st.

You must follow these procedures for both travel and time off requests.

retrieved_docs.page_content: Employees are expected to maintain the highest ethical standards. Harassment and discrimination are not tolerated. All communication should be professional.

ACME Corp reimburses employees for pre-approved, business-related expenses. This includes travel, accommodation,

and client meals. For client meals, the reimbursement limit is $50 per person. All expense reports must be

submitted through the Concur portal within 30 days of the expense being incurred. Original receipts are mandatory

for all claims over $25.
All new employees at ACME Corp receive a new MacBook Pro on their first day. Please see IT to comple setup. All software must be approved by IT.

ACME Corp conducts annual performance reviews every November. The process includes a self-assessment by the

employee, followed by a formal review meeting with their direct manager. Goals for the upcoming year are set duri

this meeting. Mid-year check-ins are held in May to discuss progress, but these are informal.

Employees at ACME Corp accrue vacation days annually. Full-time employees receive 20 days per year, accrued bi-weekly. Time off must be requested at least two weeks in advance via the employee portal. Unused vacation days up to a maximum of 5 days, can be rolled over to the next calendar year. Rollover days expire on March 31st. Manager approval is required and is final.
ACME Corp processes payroll on a bi-weekly basis. Pay stubs are available on the 15th and last day of each month via the employee portal. Direct deposit is mandatory.

Based only on the provided context:

Policy on professional conduct during business trips:
Employees are expected to maintain the highest ethical standards. Harassment and discrimination are not tolerated. All communication should be professional.

How to file expenses:
ACME Corp reimburses employees for pre-approved, business-related expenses, including travel, accommodation, and client meals (with a $50 per person limit for client meals). All expense reports must be submitted through the Concur portal within 30 days of the expense being incurred. Original receipts are mandatory for all claims over $25.
